findValueObjects

public <PK extends java.io.Serializable,E extends Entity<PK>> java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> findValueObjects(EntityFilter<PK,E> filter,
                                                                                                                                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> projection,
                                                                                                                                                Pagination pagination)
Description copied from interface: EntityRepository
Gets list of entity`s value objects (map property->value) selected by filter according to projection options. Projection options looks like map (property name->property path).

Type Parameters:
PK - type of entities primary key
E - type of entities
Parameters:
filter - selection filter (not null)
projection - projection options (not null)
pagination - selection pagination(not null)
Returns:
list of entity`s value objects selected by filter or empty list if not found
